dotnetType.name: IntegerSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.LongSchema" />
            and attempts to map them to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new integer serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds an integer serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

returns.summary: Whether the schema is an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> or a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.LongSchema" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a schema.

returns.summary: Always true; this case will apply but fail if no conversion exists to <see cref="T:System.Int64" />.

overloads.summary: Determines whether the case can be applied to a type resolution.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntegerSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
